messages.msgSnippet: ... Exactly. ... Well, you seem to be doing a pretty good job, so maybe I ll slack up and do some work I need to do. Joylyn ... [Non-text portions of this
messages.messageBody:
Ren wrote:

>
> "Joylyn-
> I don't understand how you can post a lengthy letter describing how
> offensive the word retard is to you, and how you never describe your
> children in
> an
> offensive way, yet you go on to call the children in your classroom "the
> little
> retards."
> Mary J"
>
> I took it as Joylyn's way of sarcastically showing how offensive the
> word is!

Exactly.

> I've appreciated your posts a lot lately Joylyn...keep 'em coming.

Well, you seem to be doing a pretty good job, so maybe I'll slack up and
do some work I need to do.

Joylyn

>
>
> Ren

messages.subject: mental disability was retards
messages.msgSnippet: Joylyn- I don t understand how you can post a lengthy letter describing how offensive the word retard is to you, and how you never describe your children in
messages.messageBody:
"Joylyn-
I don't understand how you can post a lengthy letter describing how
offensive the word retard is to you, and how you never describe your children in
an
offensive way, yet you go on to call the children in your classroom "the
little
retards."
Mary J"

I took it as Joylyn's way of sarcastically showing how offensive the word is! I've appreciated your posts a lot lately Joylyn...keep 'em coming.

Ren
